parameters.name: Do registration
parameters.description: whether to register data (2 forces re-registration)

parameters.name: Multi channel alignment
parameters.description: when multi-channel, you can align by non-functional channel (1-based)

parameters.name: Smooth sigma time
parameters.description: gaussian smoothing in time. If do_optimize_motion_params is set, this will be overridden

parameters.name: Smooth sigma
parameters.description: ~1 good for 2P recordings, recommend 3-5 for 1P recordings. If do_optimize_motion_params is set, this will be overridden

parameters.name: Max registration shift non-rigid
parameters.description: maximum pixel shift allowed for nonrigid, relative to rigid

parameters.name: SNR threshold
parameters.description: if any nonrigid block is below this threshold, it gets smoothed until above this threshold. 1.0 results in no smoothing

parameters.name: Data Type
parameters.description: Whether input data is TIFF of HDF5 format

parameters.name: Acquisition Data Type
parameters.description: Indicate if this is a single or multiplane data asset
